en.title: Online Speed Converter ‚Äî km/h, m/s, knots

overview.title: About Speed Converter
overview.content: Our speed converter allows you to quickly and accurately convert between different speed measurement units. Supports all major units: km/h, m/s, and knots.

calculation.title: How Conversion Works
calculation.content: All speed units are converted through the base unit - m/s. Each unit has its own conversion formula, ensuring calculation accuracy.

units.title: Supported Units
units.content: The converter supports 3 main speed units: kilometers per hour (km/h), meters per second (m/s), and knots (nautical miles per hour).

advantages.title: Advantages of Our Converter
advantages.content: Accurate calculations, instant conversion, 4 languages support, user-friendly interface, mobile version.

faqItems.q: How to convert km/h to m/s?
faqItems.a: Divide km/h by 3.6 to get m/s. For example: 36 km/h = 36 √∑ 3.6 = 10 m/s.

faqItems.q: How to convert knots to km/h?
faqItems.a: Multiply knots by 1.852 to get km/h. For example: 10 knots = 10 √ó 1.852 = 18.52 km/h.

faqItems.q: How to convert m/s to knots?
faqItems.a: Multiply m/s by 1.94384 to get knots. For example: 5 m/s = 5 √ó 1.94384 = 9.72 knots.
A knot is a unit of speed equal to one nautical mile per hour (1.852 km/h). Used in maritime and aviation.

faqItems.q: Wie konvertiert man km/h in m/s?
faqItems.a: Teilen Sie km/h durch 3,6, um m/s zu erhalten. Zum Beispiel: 36 km/h = 36 √∑ 3,6 = 10 m/s.

faqItems.q: Wie konvertiert man Knoten in km/h?
faqItems.a: Multiplizieren Sie Knoten mit 1,852, um km/h zu erhalten. Zum Beispiel: 10 Knoten = 10 √ó 1,852 = 18,52 km/h.

faqItems.q: Wie konvertiert man m/s in Knoten?
faqItems.a: Multiplizieren Sie m/s mit 1,94384, um Knoten zu erhalten. Zum Beispiel: 5 m/s = 5 √ó 1,94384 = 9,72 Knoten.
